layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  RenderView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 40x22
  LayoutTable {table} at (0,0) size 40x22
    LayoutTableSection (anonymous) at (0,0) size 40x22
      LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,2) size 40x18
        LayoutTableCell {td} at (2,2) size 36x18 [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
          RenderText {#text} at (1,1) size 34x16
            text run at (1,1) width 34: "a test"
